Lastly, based on your preferences, I recommend watching "Schindler' s List". This historical drama is set during World War II and tells the story of Oskar Schindler, a German businessman who owns a factory in Poland. After his工厂 is occupied by the Soviet红军 as part of their military campaign in Eastern Europe, Schindler realizes that he must do something to save his Jewish workforce from persecution by the Soviet红军.

After a series of negotiations and diplomatic中间人, Schindler manages to convince the Soviet红军 commander, General Zhukov, to spare the lives of the Jewish workers who work for Schindler's factory in Poland.

Schindler's success in convincing General Zhukov to spare the lives at the expense of the Jewish workforce is considered to be one of the greatest acts of courage and bravery ever committed by a human being.

1) "The Deer Hunter" (1978): This biographical film tells the story of Ron Kovic, a paralyzed Vietnam War veteran who becomes an anti-war and pro-human rights political activist.

2) "Born on the Fourth of July" (1989): This historical drama film tells the story of Alan Turing, a Cambridge mathematician who was forced by the British government to work on cracking Nazi Germany's Enigma code during World War II. The film also delves into Turing's troubled personal life, including his affair with fellow mathematician Joan Schriffer.

3) "The Imitation Game" (2014): This historical drama film tells the story of Alan Turing, a Cambridge mathematician who was forced by the British government to work on cracking Nazi Germany's Enigma code during World War II. The film also delves into Turing's troubled personal life, including his affair with fellow mathematician Joan Schriffer.

4) "Braveheart" (1995): This historical drama film tells the story of William Wallace, a Scottish warrior who rises up against English tyranny during the late 13th and early 14th centuries.

1. "Monsters vs. Aliens"
This animated movie follows a group of monsters who are sent by the U.S. government to defeat an alien mastermind trying to take over Earth.
The movie features a mix of action, comedy, and musical numbers. The animation is colorful and creative, making it a fun and entertaining movie for all ages.
2. "Aladdin"
This classic Disney animated movie follows the adventures of a young street urch named Aladdin (voice by: Will Smith) who dreams of one day being able to marry the girl of his dreams - Princess Jasmine (voice by: Lisa Marie Presley).
Throughout his journey, Aladdin is aided by several magical creatures including his pet monkey Abu (voiced by: Eddie Murphy)) who teach him how to manipulate objects using special powers known as genieology.
In addition to its engaging story and memorable characters, "Aladdin" also features a mix of action, comedy, and musical numbers. The animation is colorful and creative, making it a fun and entertaining movie for all ages.
